# Load pacakges
```{r echo=F, warning=F}
options(scipen=999)
library(disR)
library(tidyverse)
load("../../downloads/basic.Rdata")
```


```{r}
indicators %>%
  filter(ic_1819 == "EG.3.2-27/EG.3.2-x6")
```

## Summarize values
```{r}
indicators %>%
  filter((ic == "EG.3.2-27" & d2 == "Value of financing received" &
           d3 == "Sex of recipient(s)" & d4 == "Female") |
           
           (ic == "EG.3.2-x6" & d2 == "Female") ) %>%
  left_join(values, join_by(id == id_ind)) %>%
  left_join(ims, join_by(id_im == id)) %>%
  filter(type == "Actual") %>%
  group_by(ro, year) %>%
  summarize(sum_(value))
```
